item.name: Debris on the track: go to the start
hint.auto.youDidNotEndOnBlackDot: The robot should stop on the black dot.
hint.auto.noRepeatWhileUsedToPositionAut: Almost right. Now try to let the robot automatically find the black spot. Use 'repeatWhile'.
hint.auto.noFrontIsObstacleUsedToPositio: On the right track! Now let the robot automatically go in the right direction by using 'frontIsObstacle'.
hint.auto.noFrontIsBlackUsedToPositionAu: On the right track! Now let the robot automatically stop in front of the black spot by using 'frontIsBlack'.
